alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued March 30 at 6:41PM CDT until March 30 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Western Clay County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... Eastern Adams County in south central Nebraska... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 639 PM CDT, a dust channel was near Lawrence, or 19 miles southeast of Hastings, extending northward between Hastings and Harvard. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. Locations impacted include... Hastings, Nelson, Fairfield, Glenvil, Lawrence, Trumbull, Inland, Deweese and Hansen. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
